title: Download the free League Friends mobile app!

replies.body: Wish you'd make the app for the eight of us on Windows Phones.
That's the joke.
Sarcasm game wasn't strong enuf
No Windows Phone version. Basically like Thane said, there just aren't enough League players with Windows Phones to justify supporting the app on an ongoing basis.

Could you please ask Rito to provide a way to "hide mobile users"?

Thanks very muchly!
You could take a look on Microsoft's Project Islandwood xD

In fairness, if you hadn't heard, Microsoft *was* planning to bridge iOS AND Android apps so they both run on Windows products including phones. They recently announced that they're dropping the Android bridge but hopefully some time in the near future you'll be able to run iOS apps on your phone.

Buying a Lumia was the biggest mistake I ever made.
Do you have the Windows 10 update, or still on 8?
mm, this app cost me $12.. why did it not specify it costed money to buy this friends app when the button on iphone was 'get' >_<

Hey - this shouldn't be happening, and we're not seeing this issue when we're checking it out on the Apple Store.

Can you let me know how you saw this message? Did you click on the direct link above, or search the app store?

I clicked on the link above, and then search for the same app on my iphone and downloaded it, when i attempted to download it, it kept telling me my payment method was being declined(Because i had no money in the account it was trying to withdraw from), so I moved money there to see if it would just pass it through now that there was money in the account (Which was a bit odd in general, because its meant to be a free app right?) then i look in my bank and $12 was withdrawn and the app was downloaded.
most likely whats happend is you have outstanding payments on your apple account if you do then apple wont let you download any apps till you pay up
Really? .. but I haven't bought anything.. ahh well, its not a major if everyone else is getting it for free then it must be this..
oh if you haven't idk what wrong then maybe give iTunes support a call

Looks like when you searched for the app that you didn't find the same app as the one we've published above - it doesn't cost anything to download and is completely free. 

I'm not personally sure of the exact way of doing so (no iPhone here!), but you may want to reach out to Apple to see if you can get a refund on that purchase and make sure you are finding the right app in the store.

You can't create fake apps for iPhones, Its the same icon, its published by Riot Games.... same name and same download size, same rating score.. its the same app.. this is the screenshot of the app i got http://imgur.com/U80AlR9 as you can see it says 'open' meaning i've already got it, since it did cost me $12 to get..
you still owe me that blood moon yas because of the oh so inconvenient problem ;) you caused

Could you please ask Rito to provide a way to "hide mobile users"?

Thanks very muchly!
upon futher investigation it says 'Download the free League Friends mobile app!" still... why did it cost me $12 :(
actually it is possible to fake an app, it was done for clash royale on android before it was released to android.

When the App Store declines your payment method it usually means you've still got old pending transactions that haven't been approved.
This $12 is probably from a while ago where you bought other apps or micro-transactions but didn't have any money in your account when they tried taking the payment (can take a few days)
rito could you add like voice chat to the app
nice to see an official app by riot :P

I have an HTC One M9. The app doesn't show up on the list when i search it and when i checked it via my PC whether by clicking the Android link above, it says My devices are incompatible. Please let me know why? Again. Device is HTC One M9 and runs on Lollipop 5.1
Thanks for posting this.  Are you running on the standard HTC version of Android, or have you put a third party one on (eg Cyanogenmod or similar)?
The original version (Sense 7.0 overlay)

why it says that "your username and password for Chat is not valid please try again" 
I have typed my acc name as well as the password more than 10times. is that becoz the chat username is different from the one we used to login the game?
Your account details should be the same as for the game.  Have you got the correct region selected?

I have everything correct (username, password and region) and it still gives me that error. I've tried with a different account and the problem is the same. Also, I already tried to reinstall the app. Still nothing :(
Great, now all I need is friends
omg XD
If the app had the function of telling you when your queue pops and/or when your game loads in then it would be perfect. Great for toilet breaks!
Ah bugger, my phone is too old to get the app {{item:3070}}
Haha if only i had friends
cant log in to the app because every time i try to change my region it forces me out of the app
nice
The app is just a black screen for me. How do I fix it
OMG NOT ON WINDOWS PHONE? WHY? THAT'S IT, IM DONE, IM GONNA QUIT LoL NOW FOR REAL.!
I would love to download this app on my iphone 6 plus. Too bad my phone doesn't support being put in the washing machine by stooopid sister {{item:2049}} {{item:3070}}
I need this app on widows phone store , and my friend has blackberry and he doesnt have this app too ,also please do it for Blackberry OS
Please add skin, shop and build viewing and custom build creation thanks?
if you could make this into a like companion app where we can buy things from the store and look up all league related stuff like patch note that would be absolutely amazing

How come a have a permanent notification at the bottom of my app? It has like at the bottom the number 1 in a red circle saying that I have a notification from a friend when I don't. None of my chats have a new message

'We polymorphed your buddies, and now they fit in your pants.' 
Oh god :O
CBF updating my iPhone from 8.1 to 8.3 sadly.
Much better than LoL Connect lmao {{champion:79}}
